PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the ( 010 ) in-plane pattern related to π-π stacking , as shown Figure 1b , a broad diffraction peak was detected at approximately 24.0 ° .

Let's think step by step.

1. ( 010 ) - Plane label
2. in-plane pattern - Pattern type
3. related to π-π stacking - Relationship
4. approximately 24.0 ° - Angle
5. Figure 1b - Figure label.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Plane label: ( 010 )
2. Pattern type: in-plane pattern
3. Relationship: related to π-π stacking
4. Angle: approximately 24.0 °
5. Figure label: Figure 1b.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Angle: approximately 24.0 °.

This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property (angle of diffraction). The other entities (plane label, pattern type, and figure label) describe the context or conditions of the measurement of the material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In the ( 010 ) in-plane pattern related to π-π stacking , as shown Figure 1b , a broad diffraction peak was detected at approximately 24.0 ° .

Let's think step by step.

1. ( 010 ) - This is a Miller index, representing a crystallographic plane in the crystal structure. It is a property value, specifically a crystallographic plane index.
2. 24.0 ° - This is an angle measurement, representing the position of a diffraction peak in the X-ray diffraction pattern. It is a property value, specifically an angle measurement.

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are:

1. ( 010 ) - a crystallographic plane index
2. 24.0 ° - an angle measurement.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a value of a material property is:

1. 24.0 ° - an angle measurement, representing the position of a diffraction peak in the X-ray diffraction pattern. It is a property value, specifically an angle measurement of a material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 24.0 ° |

This table represents the property value entity in the paragraph, which is an angle measurement of 24.0 degrees.
